title: Opinion: New gonorrhea drug is not just a scientific breakthrough but a business one
description: Turning the tide on antibiotic resistance will require new ways of working, writes executive director of the Global Antibiotic Research & Development Partnership.
content: Turning the tide on antibiotic resistance will require new ways of working, writes executive director of the Global Antibiotic Research & Development Partnership.
